text.p: Port conditions from Lloyds Shipping Intelligence Service --

AUSTRALIA, Sept 2 - Coal - Queensland, Abbot Point - berth vacant. 7 vessels due by 29/9. No delays. Dalrymple Bay - one vessel loading, 3 waiting. 9 due by 17/9. Approx 2-3 days delay expected. Hay Point - berth no. 1 still undergoing repairs. Date of re-opening to be confirmed. One vessel loading, 3 waiting. 15 due by 22/9. Approx 2-3 days delay. Gladstone, R.G. Tanna - 1 vessel loading, 4 waiting. 23 due by 21/9. Approx 2-3 days delay. Barney Point - no shiploading/train unloading 8-25/10 due to maintenance shutdown of plant and equipment. Brisbane - berth vacant. 5 vessels due by 15/9. No delays.

NSW - Newcastle - dykes 4+5 - 2 vessels loading, 6 waiting. 9 due by 11/9. Approx 5-6 days delay. Kooragang - 2 vessels loading, 7 waiting. 14 due by 12/9. Approx 5-6 days delay. Port Kembla - major breakdowns due to gale-force winds and heavy rain during the last 48 hours, bringing loading operations to a halt. One vessel loading, 1 waiting. 13 due by 15/10. Approx 1 days delay.

IRON ORE - W.AUSTRALIA - Port Hedland - BHP iron ore pty Mt. Newman (Nelson Point) A Berth - 1 vessel loading, 1 anchored. 5 due by 11/9. Maintenance to shiploader no. 2 on 6/9. B Berth - 1 vessel loading, 1 anchored. 5 due by 10/9. 8 other vessels due by 21/9 - BHP iron ore - Goldsworthy (Finucane Island) - 3 vessels due by 9/9. 1 other vessel due by 12/9. Dampier - Parker Point - 1 vessel loading, 1 anchored. 2 due by 2/9. East Intercourse island - 1 vessel loading, 1 anchored. 3 due by 3/9. Dampier line-up - 8 vessels due by 15/9 of which 6 for Parker Point, 2 for East Intercourse Island. Port Walcott - one vessel loading, 1 waiting. 8 ue by 19/9.

GRAIN - Sept 4 - Queensland - Mackay, Gladstone - no vessels due. Brisbane - three vessels due by 11/9. NSW - Newcastle - one wheat vessel in port. 7 vessels due by 25/9. Port Kembla - six wheat vessels due. Victoria - Geelong - four vessels due by 30/9. Portland - three vessels due by 23/9.

South Australia - Port Pirie - three wheat vessels due by 15/9. Port Adelaide - five vessels due by 16/9. Thevenard - one wheat vessel due 11/9. Port Lincoln - two wheat vessels due by 16/9. Wallaroo, Ardrossan - no vessels due. Port Giles - one barley vessel due 4/9. W.Australia - Geraldton - four vessels due by 11/9. Kwinana - two wheat vessels in port. 7 due by 16/9. Grain terminal currently working dayshift Monday to Friday only due to industrial dispute. Albany - one wheat vessel in port. 1 vessel due 17/9. Esperance - one barley vessel due 10/9.
